#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>
#include<cassert>
using namespace std;
int cs,n,m,mn,i,j,s;
char x[5001],y[5001],z[5001];
int main()
{
  scanf("%d",&cs);
  while(cs--)
  {
    scanf("%s%s",x,y);
    n=strlen(x);
    m=strlen(y);
    if(n>m)
    {
      strcpy(z,x);
      strcpy(x,y);
      strcpy(y,z);
      swap(n,m);
    }
    mn=n;
    for(i=0;i<=m-n;i++)
    {
      for(j=s=0;j<n;j++)
        s+=x[j]!=y[i+j];
      mn=min(mn,s);
    }
    printf("%d\n",mn);
  }
  return 0;
}
